channel.title: blog on Luis Santos
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Luis Santos

item.title: JVM performance and optimizations
item.description: What makes Java so great is not the language itself but the platform where it runs. The JVM is an amazing piece of software and can easily out perform platforms like C++ or GO.

item.title: Beirut - Elephant Gun
item.description: If I was young, I'd flee this town I'd bury my dreams underground As did I, we drink to die, we drink tonight
